Class mootcan.UserParser 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Thread
           |
           +----mootcan.UserParser
public class UserParser
extends Thread
reads lines from an InputStream, and passes them on to an OutputStream. in addition we will search for special messages from the user to the client.
